Key Match Events: India closed in on a semi-final spot with a thumping 50-run win over Bangladesh in Antigua.
India reached 196/5, with Bangladesh making 146/8 in their response.
Rohit Sharma became Shakib al Hasan's 50th T20 World Cup wicket.
Hardik Pandya hit a half-century off 27 balls.
Kuldeep Yadav took two crucial wickets, removing Towhid Hridoy and Shakib al Hasan.
Jasprit Bumrah took the wicket of Najmul Hossain Shanto.
Arshdeep Singh took two wickets, including Jaker Ali and Mahmudullah.
